channel.title: Forum of Lies Neutral Creation Competition
channel.description:
# Forum of Lies is in need of a new Neutrals?
# And you can help!
Starting immediately and going on until April 15th - We’re accepting ideas for new Neutrals to be added into Forum of Lies.
# Prize -
The winner of this competition will have their class added into the official version of Forum of Lies. (barring balance modifications)
Can change my pfp for the next month
If the Winner wants a custom title to match their class that got added.
# Competition Rules.
* We may accept more than one winner, but atm we can only guarantee the FOL team will pick one * The Win condition for the class can be anything as long as its achievable. * The Class must have a unique coloration different from other current neuts * The class’ type can be any except Killer. NO NKS! The other important thing is it’s faction must be Neutral… Yeah, go figure. * Must make a King Version of the Class and right that it promotes to it * The format for the class card must be the same as all the other Forum of Lies cards. Check the [FOL Class Cards](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998?u=datbird) for reference * You must have previously participated in at least one Forum of Lies, Special Forum of Lies, Newbie Forum of Lies, or Experimental Forum of Lies. * Winners will be chosen by the Forum of Lies Team ( Myself, Arete, and the rest of the Forum of Lies team) on April 15th, and the winner will be announced shortly after. * No cheating! Don’t copy other player’s ideas. Don’t steal other people’s custom classes from elsewhere on the forum. All the obvious stuff. * You may submit any number of classes, but remember: Quality > Quantity.
## Bonus Points.
* Try to keep the theme fitting with Forum of Lies. Make it something unique and special, but don’t break the theme too hard! * Try and make new win conditions, we love having varied gameplay
# The competition begins… now! You may post your submissions in a class card format in response to this post, while also @ing me.

item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
The Missionary still needs to kill themselves and waste a day for it to work. Not really worth it especially as there’s conversion in the game as well.

item.title: Forum of Lies Neutral Creation Competition
item.dc:creator: anon97870008
item.description:
The interesting thing is if you combo it with its 1-shot night ability

Revelation (Night) - If you use Desperation tomorrow, its effect will only activate should the target be a member of the Blue Dragon. - 1 Use

As Missionary you put in your logs: “if I get executed instead of this guy, he is 100% confirmed BD”
That’s a non-fakeable hardconfirm, which is probably pretty strong

Read full topic
